duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a hunter and farmer of accounts, consistently increasing the book of business and building relationships with maintenance supervisors, foremen, purchasing, owners, etc.
Capture the interest of new customers by demonstrating high-quality products after receiving hands-on training on top selling items.
Achieve sales objectives on a plan for success designed specifically for the role.
Fulfill the Two-Customer Philosophy working hand-in-hand with full support from the internal staff, going above and beyond the customers’ expectations.
Manage time and work independently, including developing a route and schedule.
Exhibit detailed product knowledge when assessing customers’ needs and offering solutions from a catalog of over 55,000 maintenance, repair, or operations products.

education_certification.credential: History of success and a minimum of 1-3 years of outside sales experience.
Experience building business relationships with end-users of maintenance and repair products.
